alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:31PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Windham, northern Tolland and northeastern Hartford Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Enfield, Vernon, Mansfield, Ellington, Tolland, Coventry, Stafford, Somers, East Windsor, Thompson, Brooklyn, Woodstock, Willington, Ashford, Pomfret, Chaplin, Hampton, Eastford and Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
